title: Bayer Leverkusen – A Dream Comes True
overview: Unforgettable insights into the most successful season in the 120-year history of Bayer 04 Leverkusen: The Amazon Exclusive sports documentary Bayer Leverkusen – A Dream Comes True will be exclusively available on Prime Video from 16 September. The four-part series follows the Werkself close-up on the way to winning the Bundesliga title and the DFB Pokal.A number of players including Florian Wirtz and Granit Xhaka, head coach Xabi Alonso, the team behind the team as well as the managing directors Fernando Carro and Simon Rolfes share their insights and convey emotional impressions from the historic 2023/24 campaign. The documentary impressively demonstrates the thrills of late goals in important games and shows how the Werkself, with remarkably positive energy, again and again go beyond their limits and end a Bundesliga campaign as the first club ever undefeated over the season.
